nodes.bodyText: Pending question about permissions needs clarification https://niis.slack.com/archives/GGBHVCYSY/p1579849271003200
This has been clarified to be fine
maybe description should say just "address" or something, since it is not guaranteed to be an ip address, can be a name also
nodes.diffHunk:

           example: server123
           minLength: 1
           maxLength: 255
+        server_address:
+          type: string
+          format: text
+          description: security server ip address
